name: Dragon Island (Mango Mob)
description:
Focuses primarily on giving the players freedom to indulge in whatever activities they wish to pass the time. Whether it be combatting slimes, raising crops or talking to dragons to help them or learn more about the island.

Controls:

       Included with executable ("Dragon Island - Controls.txt")
